promptTemplate: A first-person perspective selfie: {character_description}, moving through {ancient_scene_description}. With focused expression, {pronoun_subject} explains the unfolding scene. {pronoun_subject} reacts with {voice_tone}, exclaiming '{scene_dialogue}' The camera, at a dynamic low angle, vibrates with the action, creating a jittery first-person view as the streamer navigates through the historical chaos. Cinema-quality realistic visuals with dramatic lighting and immersive atmosphere, emphasizing the striking contrast between modern streaming technology and the ancient world.
